Welcome to the NoCrastinate Help Center! Here you should find all the information you need to make the best use of NoCrastinate and beat your procrastination habits once and for all! 

Statistics
On the statistics screen you’ll see a regularly updated view of your phone usage stats. The top three icons display the number of times you have unlocked your phone, the overall time you have spent on your phone and the number of tasks you’ve completed. Below the icons a drop down menu allows you to adjust the time interval that the stats are gathered from. “Daily” stats correspond to the those gathered from midnight that day, “Weekly” to those from the week previous, “Monthly” to the past month and “Yearly” to the last year. Underneath the drop down you’ll find a list of all the applications with registered usage on your phone alongside the time they have been in your phone’s foreground. On adjusting the time interval these stats will change alongside the top 3 icons.

To Do List
NoCrastinate’s to do page offers an easy to use way of organising your tasks, setting due dates, alarms and tracking your completed todos. Simply add a to do by pressing the + ‘add’ button in the top right corner of the screen, enter your to do’s details and save. To do’s are listed in order of due date, with those with no due date listed last. To edit or delete a to do, simply click on it where you will be taken to a dedicated screen. To do’s are checked off as completed by simply clicking the checkboxes to each to do’s left. At the bottom of the screen, a button “View Completed ToDo’s” will take you to a list of all the to do’s that have been completed, once again to edit, delete or uncheck a to do, you can do so by pressing it.

Notifications
Want to give yourself the ultimate push to spending less time on your phone and start checking off those important tasks? Our flexible notification settings allow NoCrastinate to notify you when you’ve been spending too much time on your phone or with daily or weekly reports. For optimal use, we recommend allowing NoCrastinate to contact you when you’re spending too much time on your phone - you will receive notifications every hour of clocked screen time and every time you unlock your phone 25 times. Digital detox here we come!

Block Applications
If you're still finding your phone that bit too distracting, use our Block Applications feature to shut down the apps that you're wasting the most time on. Just one click blocks the app from opening up, and another unblocks it if you're giving yourself a little break from digital detox!
